title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.2 is released, upgrade your project now. It contains lot of major improvements for multi-threading environment. More thread-safety improvements will be included in wffweb-3.0.3
3.0.3 will deliver better performance for UI updates because its internal algorithm for generating UI data for updating client (browser page) is upgraded. Visit webfirmframework.com/demo for early experience. Please know that your donations make this framework alive. If you prefer to donate using other platforms, please contact tech-support@webfirmframework.com.
